nodes.bodyText: There was nasty bug here which prevented timer deletion because the to-be-deleted TimerData had a different timestamp than the original timer, leading to not actually deleting the timer from the map.
It seems strange that the deprecated method is the one being used, and the recommended method is not implemented.
yeah, actually that might have been a mistake when the timer family was added because the old way was to use TimerData and the new way is to use timerId/timerFamily.
Maybe worth a JIRA/refactor? I'll leave it up to you since I am not as familiar with this code.
